name: Hilton Dublin Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travel a lot and usually stay at Hilton Hotels because I'm in their plan. This usually provides me with good accommodations and special treatment because of my Hilton Honors status. The staff was generally unfriendly. We got a so-so room on a bottom floor. We had to pay for internet. We ate in the hotel's restaurant and the food was good. We stayed there for access to airport, we had an early morning flight. Probably could have stayed in town one more night since the airport was still a long ways away. Shame on Hilton for not making its members feel welcome.
reviews.title: Should have been better for a Hilton

reviews.text: I throughly enjoyed my stay there. The hotel room was nice and clean . A free shuttle bus was also provided to take the hotel guests to a nearby town at night. When I and my friend missed the bus by a minute, the hotel staff called the driver to stop on the side road, so that we could catch them. We had a wonderful night listening to some Irish songs and enjoyed a drink.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff there were wonderful and very approachable. Their professional standards and customer care were high.The breakfast was great with lots of choice.
reviews.title: Good For Transit From Dublin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this lovely hotel and would love to return there again.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, poor location.

reviews.text: We stayed in Dublin several days, but had an early flight back to the states so we wanted to be closer to the airport. Was a little disappointed that this hotel was still 15-20 min ride to the airport. We turned in our rental car at the airport and took the shuttle to the hotel. Check in was easy, had a nice non-smoking room with a king bed. Ate a good meal in the restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellent stay and very nice hotel. Classy establishment.

reviews.text: Room good size, bed comfy, bathroom small but clean !
reviews.title: Average hotel !

reviews.text: But...standard not as expected for a hilton hotel, as carpet is terribly old and full of dirty stains - really bad !
reviews.title: Nice airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 2 nights and pillowcases were not changed - poor service.
reviews.title: Some very good points, a few just ok, overall very good.

reviews.text: Requested connecting rooms,as we booked 2, and on arrival reception guy couldn't care less !
reviews.title: A little overpriced

reviews.text: Was given 1 room facing the backyard and the other down the corridor, facing the front street, after i asked room with a view ! No hotel slippers, gown in room or water !
reviews.title: Tired.

reviews.text: From our arrival to departure our experience at this hotel was totally positive. While it is only 6 years old, it seems even much newer. Wonderful staff, great value.
reviews.title: Would absolutely return to this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Dublin Airport for 2 nights.
reviews.title: Not an airport hotel, but a good hotel.

reviews.text: It’s an Airport hotel, but a cut above most others.
reviews.title: Horrible Hilton!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was extremely clean and room service itself was flawless. We had a great bed and a very quiet room through the night. Not your typical Airport hotel.
reviews.title: Standard Hilton
Very impressed with customer service
reviews.text: The buffet breakfast is very well stocked and the staff is typically Irish. That is, they see to your every need with a warm smile, a nice word and impeccable manners. The front of house kept in mind our flight details and suggested what time shuttle we needed to be on to properly connect.

Enjoyed an overnight stay with my daughter. Staff were wonderful and very informative. Music and food was also great. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Airport shuttle supplied free of charge. Would stay there again.
reviews.title: Great staff

reviews.text: first of all nothing was stolen... but it felt like it. This is an expensive hotel, but not ridiculously so.
reviews.title: smiles as they steal your wallet...

reviews.text: My steak ended up €37+ euros, by adding prawns and veg... good but not great, it lacked flavour and was a little over cooked.
reviews.title: Good place to stay however....

reviews.text: a basic bottle of shiraz was €28...
reviews.title: Convenient, good service, but needs a bit of work now

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So my dinner of one course and wine was over €60, by any standards this is on the expensive side for a 4 star hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel !

description: Just a short distance from Dublin Airport by complimentary shuttle, the Hilton Dublin Airport hotel has 9 flexible meeting rooms with wireless internet access and a ballroom for up to 350. De-stress in the gym or wind down in the newly refurbished Burnell Bar & Grill, or visit nearby Dublin attractions, just 5 kilometres away.
